snippet: “Hope Springs” is another summer film aimed beyond the teenage and young-adult market. Movies like it and “The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel” are proving that older audiences exist.
abstract: Hope Springs, starring Meryl Streep and Tommy Lee Jones, and The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel, starring Judi Dench and Celia Imrie, are latest example of films aimed at older audiences.
lead_paragraph: “Hope Springs” is another summer film aimed beyond the teenage and young-adult market. Movies like it and “The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel” are proving that older audiences exist.

headline.seo: ‘Hope Springs’ and the Older Movie Audience
headline.main: Generation All: Movies for Older, by the Younger
headline.print_headline: Generation All: Movies for Older, By the Younger
